name: Mere Square
description:
Play as the mere square, blast the enemy into the air, waste your rounds then heal your wounds and for good luck follow my account or you become a duck 

🦆 w,a,s,d / arrows - movement space / left mouse click - fire mouse - aim

black squares - enemy (shoot them)

yellow square = player (that's you)

red square - healing puzzle (if you don't succeed you lose health)

Programmer: Kayakaga

Music / Sound Effects : Aiden, freesound.org
